column4: I have just installed ubuntu onto a system that uses a raid controller and now at the reboot, it won't boot.  what can I do?
httpdss... given that I can't boot the computer, how?
no ide drives, just serial ata
can anyone help?  I really want to get this system up and running
how do I do that httpdss?
I can't get to grub, it's not seeing a hard drive.  hmm, is there a way to make an ubuntu boot floppy in windows?
hmm, I could make an ubuntu boot cd, that might do it, manually edit the boot that way
you could also try a floppy with grub on it
